hero_desc: Professional FDM service in PLA & PETG. Prototypes, short runs and functional parts.
step1_desc: Find a model or tell us your idea to model from scratch.
step2_desc: Use the estimator to upload .stl/.obj/.zip and tune params.
step3_desc: Pay with Stripe or request a custom quote.
step4_desc: Shipping across Spain. Local pickup optional.
pricing_desc: Direct purchase with Stripe. For custom parts, use the estimator.
contact_desc: Tell me about your project and I’ll send a proposal.
ai_privacy: Private. Your data is not published. LLM.
